plugin.comment: vocalizations generated at intervals when nothing else is happening.

tagRef.name: Idle Noncombat
tagRef.tooltip: played randomly and intermittently whenever we aren't in combat

tagRef.name: Idle Combat
tagRef.tooltip: played randomly and intermittently whenever we're in combat

tagRef.name: Idle Flee
tagRef.tooltip: played continuously while we are fleeing

plugin.comment: vocalizations generated automatically when damaged; interrupt everything except scripted dialogue.

tagRef.name: Pain Body Minor
tagRef.tooltip: took body damage

tagRef.name: Pain Body Major
tagRef.tooltip: took a significant amount of body damage

tagRef.name: Pain Shield
tagRef.tooltip: took shield damage

tagRef.name: Pain Falling
tagRef.tooltip: took damage from falling

tagRef.name: Scream Fear
tagRef.tooltip: screaming in fear (falling to your death, explosive stuck to you)

tagRef.name: Scream Pain
tagRef.tooltip: screaming in pain (being flamed)

tagRef.name: Maimed Limb
tagRef.tooltip: limb body part (arm or leg) was destroyed

tagRef.name: Maimed Head
tagRef.tooltip: head body part was destroyed

tagRef.name: Death Quiet
tagRef.tooltip: died from minor damage, or was unprepared

tagRef.name: Death Violent
tagRef.tooltip: died from violent trauma

tagRef.name: Death Falling
tagRef.tooltip: died from falling

tagRef.name: Death Agonizing
tagRef.tooltip: died in a horribly painful fashion (burnt to death)

tagRef.name: Death Instant
tagRef.tooltip: died instantly

tagRef.name: Death Flying
tagRef.tooltip: died and was blown up into the air

tagRef.name: Damaged Friend
tagRef.tooltip: hurt a friendly AI

tagRef.name: Damaged Friend Player
tagRef.tooltip: hurt a friendly player

tagRef.name: Damaged Enemy
tagRef.tooltip: hurt an enemy

tagRef.name: Damaged Enemy Cm
tagRef.tooltip: hurt an enemy

tagRef.name: Hurt Friend
tagRef.tooltip: hurt by a friendly AI

tagRef.name: Hurt Friend Re
tagRef.tooltip: hurt by a friendly AI

tagRef.name: Hurt Friend Player
tagRef.tooltip: hurt by a friendly player

tagRef.name: Hurt Enemy
tagRef.tooltip: hurt by an enemy

tagRef.name: Hurt Enemy Re
tagRef.tooltip: hurt by an enemy

tagRef.name: Hurt Enemy Cm
tagRef.tooltip: hurt by an enemy

tagRef.name: Hurt Enemy Bullet
tagRef.tooltip: hurt by an enemy with bullets

tagRef.name: Hurt Enemy Needler
tagRef.tooltip: hurt by an enemy with needles

tagRef.name: Hurt Enemy Plasma
tagRef.tooltip: hurt by an enemy with a plasma bolt

tagRef.name: Hurt Enemy Sniper
tagRef.tooltip: hurt by an enemy with a sniper weapon

tagRef.name: Hurt Enemy Grenade
tagRef.tooltip: a grenade is stuck to us

tagRef.name: Hurt Enemy Explosion
tagRef.tooltip: hurt by an enemy with an explosive weapon

tagRef.name: Hurt Enemy Melee
tagRef.tooltip: hurt by an enemy with a melee weapon

tagRef.name: Hurt Enemy Flame
tagRef.tooltip: hurt by an enemy with flamethrower

tagRef.name: Hurt Enemy Shotgun
tagRef.tooltip: hurt by an enemy with a shotgun

tagRef.name: Hurt Enemy Vehicle
tagRef.tooltip: hurt by an enemy with a vehicle

tagRef.name: Hurt Enemy Mountedweapon
tagRef.tooltip: hurt by an enemy with a fixed weapon

tagRef.name: Killed Friend
tagRef.tooltip: killed a friendly AI

tagRef.name: Killed Friend Cm
tagRef.tooltip: killed a friendly AI

tagRef.name: Killed Friend Player
tagRef.tooltip: killed a friendly player

tagRef.name: Killed Friend Player Cm
tagRef.tooltip: killed a friendly player

tagRef.name: Killed Enemy
tagRef.tooltip: killed an enemy

tagRef.name: Killed Enemy Cm
tagRef.tooltip: killed an enemy

tagRef.name: Killed Enemy Player
tagRef.tooltip: killed an enemy player

tagRef.name: Killed Enemy Player Cm
tagRef.tooltip: killed an enemy player

tagRef.name: Killed Enemy Covenant
tagRef.tooltip: killed an enemy covenant

tagRef.name: Killed Enemy Covenant Cm
tagRef.tooltip: killed an enemy covenant

tagRef.name: Killed Enemy Floodcombat
tagRef.tooltip: killed an enemy flood combat form

tagRef.name: Killed Enemy Floodcombat Cm
tagRef.tooltip: killed an enemy flood combat form

tagRef.name: Killed Enemy Floodcarrier
tagRef.tooltip: killed an enemy flood carrier form

tagRef.name: Killed Enemy Floodcarrier Cm
tagRef.tooltip: killed an enemy flood carrier form

tagRef.name: Killed Enemy Sentinel
tagRef.tooltip: killed an enemy sentinel

tagRef.name: Killed Enemy Sentinel Cm
tagRef.tooltip: killed an enemy sentinel

tagRef.name: Killed Enemy Bullet
tagRef.tooltip: killed an enemy with bullets

tagRef.name: Killed Enemy Needler
tagRef.tooltip: killed an enemy with needles

tagRef.name: Killed Enemy Plasma
tagRef.tooltip: killed an enemy with a plasma bolt

tagRef.name: Killed Enemy Sniper
tagRef.tooltip: killed an enemy with a sniper weapon

tagRef.name: Killed Enemy Grenade
tagRef.tooltip: killed an enemy with a grenade

tagRef.name: Killed Enemy Explosion
tagRef.tooltip: killed an enemy with an explosive weapon

tagRef.name: Killed Enemy Melee
tagRef.tooltip: killed an enemy with a melee weapon

tagRef.name: Killed Enemy Flame
tagRef.tooltip: killed an enemy with flamethrower

tagRef.name: Killed Enemy Shotgun

tagRef.name: Killed Enemy Vehicle
tagRef.tooltip: killed an enemy by hitting them with a vehicle

tagRef.name: Killed Enemy Mountedweapon
tagRef.tooltip: killed an enemy with a fixed weapon

tagRef.name: Killing Spree
tagRef.tooltip: we are on a killing spree

plugin.comment: responses to a friendly player killing an enemy nearby

tagRef.name: Player Kill Cm
tagRef.tooltip: response to the player killing an enemy

tagRef.name: Player Kill Bullet Cm
tagRef.tooltip: response to the player killing an enemy with bullets

tagRef.name: Player Kill Needler Cm
tagRef.tooltip: response to the player killing an enemy with needles

tagRef.name: Player Kill Plasma Cm
tagRef.tooltip: response to the player killing an enemy with a plasma bolt

tagRef.name: Player Kill Sniper Cm
tagRef.tooltip: response to the player killing an enemy with a sniper weapon

tagRef.name: Anyone Kill Grenade Cm
tagRef.tooltip: response to _anyone_ killing an enemy with a grenade

tagRef.name: Player Kill Explosion Cm
tagRef.tooltip: response to the player killing an enemy with an explosive weapon

tagRef.name: Player Kill Melee Cm
tagRef.tooltip: response to the player killing an enemy with a melee weapon

tagRef.name: Player Kill Flame Cm
tagRef.tooltip: response to the player killing an enemy with flamethrower

tagRef.name: Player Kill Shotgun Cm
tagRef.tooltip: response to the player killing an enemy with a shotgun

tagRef.name: Player Kill Vehicle Cm
tagRef.tooltip: response to the player killing an enemy by hitting them with a vehicle

tagRef.name: Player Kill Mountedweapon Cm
tagRef.tooltip: response to the player killing an enemy with a fixed weapon

tagRef.name: Player Killling Spree Cm
tagRef.tooltip: response to the player going on a killing spree

tagRef.name: Friend Died
tagRef.tooltip: a friendly AI died

tagRef.name: Friend Player Died
tagRef.tooltip: a friendly player died

tagRef.name: Friend Killed By Friend
tagRef.tooltip: a friend died from friendly fire

tagRef.name: Friend Killed By Friendly Player
tagRef.tooltip: friend died from player's friendly fire

tagRef.name: Friend Killed By Enemy
tagRef.tooltip: a friend died from enemy fire

tagRef.name: Friend Killed By Enemy Player
tagRef.tooltip: friend died from an enemy player

tagRef.name: Friend Killed By Covenant
tagRef.tooltip: a friend died from covenant fire

tagRef.name: Friend Killed By Flood
tagRef.tooltip: a friend died from the flood

tagRef.name: Friend Killed By Sentinel
tagRef.tooltip: a friend died from sentinel fire

tagRef.name: Friend Betrayed
tagRef.tooltip: a friend was deliberately killed by an ally that we don't trust (e.g. player killed a marine)

plugin.comment: vocalizations that can be played even if a friend is talking

tagRef.name: New Combat Alone
tagRef.tooltip: see an enemy and we have not previously been in combat

tagRef.name: New Enemy Recent Combat
tagRef.tooltip: see a new enemy and we have recently been in combat

tagRef.name: Old Enemy Sighted
tagRef.tooltip: see an enemy that we are currently looking for

tagRef.name: Unexpected Enemy
tagRef.tooltip: unexpectedly encounters enemy (behind or to the side)

tagRef.name: Dead Friend Found
tagRef.tooltip: unexpectedly finds a dead body of a friend

tagRef.name: Alliance Broken
tagRef.tooltip: we decide that a former ally is now a traitor

tagRef.name: Alliance Reformed
tagRef.tooltip: we forgive a traitor and make him our friend again

tagRef.name: Grenade Throwing
tagRef.tooltip: throwing a grenade

tagRef.name: Grenade Sighted
tagRef.tooltip: see an enemy grenade

tagRef.name: Grenade Startle
tagRef.tooltip: alerted by a grenade bouncing near us

tagRef.name: Grenade Danger Enemy
tagRef.tooltip: in danger from an enemy grenade

tagRef.name: Grenade Danger Self
tagRef.tooltip: in danger from your own grenade

tagRef.name: Grenade Danger Friend
tagRef.tooltip: in danger from a friendly grenade (not our own)

tagRef.name: New Combat Group Re
tagRef.tooltip: reply to a nearby friend who alerted us to an enemy

tagRef.name: New Combat Nearby Re
tagRef.tooltip: reply to a distant friend who alerted us to an enemy

tagRef.name: Alert Friend
tagRef.tooltip: alert a friend who is in a noncombat state

tagRef.name: Alert Friend Re
tagRef.tooltip: alerted by a friend when in a noncombat state

tagRef.name: Alert Lost Contact
tagRef.tooltip: alert friends that target was not at expected location

tagRef.name: Alert Lost Contact Re
tagRef.tooltip: alert friends that target was not at expected location

tagRef.name: Blocked
tagRef.tooltip: friend is blocking us from moving or firing

tagRef.name: Blocked Re
tagRef.tooltip: friend is blocking us from moving or firing

tagRef.name: Search Start
tagRef.tooltip: starting to search

tagRef.name: Search Query
tagRef.tooltip: asking searchers whether they have found anything

tagRef.name: Search Query Re
tagRef.tooltip: asking searchers whether they have found anything

tagRef.name: Search Report
tagRef.tooltip: searcher reporting that an area is clear

tagRef.name: Search Abandon
tagRef.tooltip: searcher giving up on search

tagRef.name: Search Group Abandon
tagRef.tooltip: search coordinator giving up on search

tagRef.name: Group Uncover
tagRef.tooltip: starting to uncover target with friend

tagRef.name: Group Uncover Re
tagRef.tooltip: starting to uncover target

tagRef.name: Advance
tagRef.tooltip: our platoon starts to attack or advance

tagRef.name: Advance Re
tagRef.tooltip: our platoon starts to attack or advance

tagRef.name: Retreat
tagRef.tooltip: our platoon starts to defend or retreat

tagRef.name: Retreat Re
tagRef.tooltip: our platoon starts to defend or retreat

tagRef.name: Cover
tagRef.tooltip: telling friends to seek cover

tagRef.name: Sighted Friend Player
tagRef.tooltip: sighted a new friendly player

tagRef.name: Shooting
tagRef.tooltip: shooting at an enemy

tagRef.name: Shooting Vehicle
tagRef.tooltip: shooting from a vehicle at an enemy

tagRef.name: Shooting Berserk
tagRef.tooltip: shooting at an enemy while berserk

tagRef.name: Shooting Group
tagRef.tooltip: shooting at a group of enemies

tagRef.name: Shooting Traitor
tagRef.tooltip: shooting at a traitorous player

tagRef.name: Taunt
tagRef.tooltip: taunting the enemy

tagRef.name: Taunt Re
tagRef.tooltip: taunted by an enemy

tagRef.name: Flee
tagRef.tooltip: fleeing in panic

tagRef.name: Flee Re
tagRef.tooltip: fleeing in panic

tagRef.name: Flee Leader Died
tagRef.tooltip: fleeing in panic because our leaders are all dead

tagRef.name: Attempted Flee
tagRef.tooltip: unable to flee because a leader is nearby

tagRef.name: Attempted Flee Re
tagRef.tooltip: unable to flee because a leader is nearby - response

tagRef.name: Lost Contact
tagRef.tooltip: target was not at expected location

tagRef.name: Hiding Finished
tagRef.tooltip: stops hiding and pursues target

tagRef.name: Vehicle Entry
tagRef.tooltip: enters vehicle

tagRef.name: Vehicle Exit
tagRef.tooltip: exits vehicle

tagRef.name: Vehicle Woohoo
tagRef.tooltip: excited while in vehicle (big air, etc)

tagRef.name: Vehicle Scared
tagRef.tooltip: scared while in vehicle (imminent crash)

tagRef.name: Vehicle Collision
tagRef.tooltip: riding in a vehicle and the driver collides with something

tagRef.name: Partially Sighted
tagRef.tooltip: saw something suspicious but not sure it was an enemy

tagRef.name: Nothing There
tagRef.tooltip: decided that a suspicious sighting was nothing after all

tagRef.name: Pleading
tagRef.tooltip: pleading for the player to spare our pitiable lives

tagRef.name: Surprise
tagRef.tooltip: surprised by an enemy, noise, body or weapon impact

tagRef.name: Berserk
tagRef.tooltip: went berserk

tagRef.name: Melee Attack
tagRef.tooltip: attacked an enemy in melee

tagRef.name: Dive
tagRef.tooltip: dove away from danger or into cover

tagRef.name: Uncover Exclamation
tagRef.tooltip: leapt out of corner to uncover a suspected target

tagRef.name: Leap Attack
tagRef.tooltip: begin a leap attack

tagRef.name: Resurrection
tagRef.tooltip: arise and return to life

tagRef.name: Celebration
tagRef.tooltip: all enemies defeated

tagRef.name: Check Body Enemy
tagRef.tooltip: post-combat checking an enemy's dead body

tagRef.name: Check Body Friend
tagRef.tooltip: post-combat checking a friend's dead body

tagRef.name: Shooting Dead Enemy
tagRef.tooltip: post-combat shooting an enemy's dead body

tagRef.name: Shooting Dead Enemy Player
tagRef.tooltip: post-combat shooting an enemy player's dead body

tagRef.name: Alone
tagRef.tooltip: post-combat all friends killed

tagRef.name: Unscathed
tagRef.tooltip: post-combat we were not hurt

tagRef.name: Seriously Wounded
tagRef.tooltip: post-combat we were badly hurt

tagRef.name: Seriously Wounded Re
tagRef.tooltip: post-combat replying to a friend who was badly hurt

tagRef.name: Massacre
tagRef.tooltip: post-combat our friends took heavy casualties

tagRef.name: Massacre Re
tagRef.tooltip: post-combat reply

tagRef.name: Rout
tagRef.tooltip: post-combat our friends kicked alien ass

tagRef.name: Rout Re
tagRef.tooltip: post-combat reply
